发现可以稳定胎儿心率模式的古典音乐长期以来，演奏音乐一直是准父母与子宫中的孩子建立联系的一种方式，但是一群研究人员发现证据可以使胎儿心率平静，有可能提供发育益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/classical-music-found-to-stabilize-fetal-rate-pate-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/classical-music-found-found-to-stabilize-fetal-rate-pate-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27d48dae-115c-4f46-9183-426293c22699 Wed, 05 Feb 2025 09:34:45 -0500 Classical music found to stabilize fetal heart rate patterns
创新方法阐明了肠道健康背后的蛋白质一项新的Weizmann Institute研究确定了粪便样本中的所有蛋白质 - 来自微生物组，人体和食物的蛋白质 - 揭示了肠道的隐藏秘密及其对人类疾病的影响https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/innovative-method-sheds-light-on-the-proteins-behind-behind-gut-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/innovative-method-sheds-light-on-the-preteins-behind-behind-behind-gut-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1899991d1-c70f-4f-4f-4f8a-890a-890a-A2C6D4665BB8 Wed, 05 Feb 2025 08:45:04 -0500 Innovative method sheds light on the proteins behind gut health
在成年初期和中期，女人的讲话比男人多在许多文化中，女性比男性更加健谈的刻板印象在许多文化中普遍存在，但是亚利桑那大学研究人员在2007年被广泛报道的研究驳斥了这一主张，发现男人和女人每天说的单词大致相同，约为16,000。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/women-speak-more-than-men-during-men-derly-early-and-middle-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/women-speak-more-than-men-during-men-during-early-andly-and-middle-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d523373d-25c9-4bd3-87775-d84d84d5fa8bf71f Wed, 05 Feb 2025 08:39:27 -0500 Women speak more than men during early and middle adulthood
大麻使用障碍病例的增加有助于增加精神分裂症的诊断根据新研究，与大麻使用障碍相关的新的精神分裂症病例的比例已从安大略省大麻合法化后的4％的预选前的4％上升到10％。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/risising-cannabis-use-disorder-cases-cases-cases-contribute-contribute to Growning-schizizophrenia-diagnoses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/risising-cannabis-use-disorder-cases-cases-cases-contribute-contribute-to noping-schizizophrenia-diagnoses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44741755-e738-4ff1-a653-97AAEAAE405FC16 Wed, 05 Feb 2025 08:15:49 -0500 Rising cannabis use disorder cases contribute to growing schizophrenia diagnoses
新研究揭示了抗癌药如何进入癌细胞一项新的研究表明，抗癌药物如何触发“外部”信号，使其吸入癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/new-study-reveals-how-anow-nationancer-drugs-enter-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/new-study-reveals-how-nowancer-nationancer-drugs-enter-cancer-cellsers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01F91458-5D50-4CB7-AEA0-9990D50531AF Wed, 05 Feb 2025 06:56:51 -0500 New study reveals how anticancer drugs enter cancer cells
